  • GRE写作专题训练-Issue-第001题

    Time goes by so fast, people go in and out of your life. You must never miss the opportunity to tell these people how much they mean to you.Time goes by so fast, people go in and out of your life. You must never miss the opportunity to tell these people how much they mean to you.Time goes by so fast, people go in and out of your life. You must never miss the opportunity to tell these people how much they mean to you.
